DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety effectiveness CyPass implantation stand-alone therapy lower intraocular pressure ( IOP ) patient primary open angle glaucoma ( POAG ) fail least one class topical medical therapy

DOC.criteria: Diagnosis POAG Medicated IOP ≥ 21 ≤ 35 mmHg Use 1 4 topical IOP lower medication Acute angle closure , traumatic , congenital , malignant , uveitic neovascular glaucoma Use oral hypotensive medication treatment glaucoma Previous incisional glaucoma surgery , combine cataractglaucoma procedure Clinically significant ocular pathology POAG
